message.raw:
Tested on Python 3 (and 2 after the following changes). Compatibility required:
* Remove unicode_literals as the new MultipartForm threw UnicodeDecodeError
  in Python 2 from urlopen when the request contains the binary file.
* get_content_type needs to return a byte string in both versions. On Python 3,
  the absence of this prevented transition_to_buffered from finishing.
* Fixed bug with calls to http_request instead of self.http_request.
* Checked compileD call on both versions; requires PY2 conditional for a kwarg.

 Checked compileD call on both versions; requires PY2 conditional for a kwarg.

message:
Tested on Python 3 (and 2 after the following changes). Compatibility required:
* Remove unicode_literals as the new MultipartForm threw UnicodeDecodeError
  in Python 2 from urlopen when the request contains the binary file.
* get_content_type needs to return a byte string in both versions. On Python 3,
  the absence of this prevented transition_to_buffered from finishing.
* Fixed bug with calls to http_request instead of self.http_request.
* Checked compileD call on both versions; requires PY2 conditional for a kwarg.
